abstract.p: Photos of fashions worn at Bridgehampton Polo Club (On the Street column)

block.p: The bucolic Bridgehampton Polo Club is a fashionable promenade on summer Saturdays at the Mercedes-Benz Polo Challenge, where high-goal polo teams compete for attention with higher-goal glamour. Sponsors give parties for 1,200 guests under a tent. This year's fashion statements are one-piece dresses and designer sportswear, accessorized with pedigreed dogs and Fendi bags. Polo fans have the other side of the field.
